summary: Started website servers - Laravel backend on port 7668 and Vite dev server on port 3001. Both servers confirmed running. User can now test the homepage with all completed sections matching Figma design.
current_status: Development servers running. Homepage ready for testing with completed sections: hero (updated typography), features, career paths, super app, popular courses, finder, Instagram, testimonials (title updated), blog (with real images), contact, banner, and footer.
